name: Dead Science
description:
You wake up in an abandoned underground research facility. Find the hidden power links and reconnect them to the infrastructure to make your escape.

Dead Science is a research experiment, designed to be played remotely.
Our goal is to better understand the way you interact with Virtual Environments.

To do this, we record the following things while playing:
    - the actions you take
    - when and where in the game you took each action
    - an anonymous, unique ID to separate your data from the rest
    - the version of the game you are using
The recordings are uploaded to our server automatically.

Requirements

To play Dead Science, you need the following:

  • A SteamVR Device (Vive, Vive Pro, Index)
    • May work with Oculus devices, not tested
  • A 2x2m tracking space
  • Windows

The game takes about 10-15 minutes to play through.

Features
  • Lasers
  • Dead Robots
  • Toxic Waste
  • A Fully Functional Elevator
  • Your Contribution to Science
